natural solution: To round $18.4851$ to the nearest hundredth, we must look at the hundreds and the thousands digits of the number in question. Since the thousands digit ($5$) is greater than or equal to $5$, the hundreds digit $8$ rounds up to $9$.
Therefore, $18.4851$ rounded to the nearest hundredth is equal to $\boxed{18.49}$.

fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "x = 18.4851"
shows  "round 2 x = 18.49"

 *)

fixes x :: real

 proof-
